1.title: FizzBuzz
1.description: Write a program that prints numbers from 1 to 100...every multiple of 3 should be replaced with the word Fizz, every multiple of 5 should be replaced with the word Buzz, and every multiple of both 3 and 5 should be replaced with FizzBuzz.
1.output: List of numbers and FizzBuzz replacements

2.title: Reverse String
2.description: Write a function to reverse a given string.

3.title: Palindrome Checker
3.description: Write a function that checks if a given string is a palindrome (reads the same backward as forward).
3.output: Boolean value (True if the string is a palindrome, False otherwise)

4.title: Factorial Calculator
4.description: Write a function to calculate the factorial of a given non-negative integer.

5.title: Anagram Checker
5.description: Write a function that checks if two given strings are anagrams (contain the same characters in the same frequency).
5.output: Boolean value (True if the strings are anagrams, False otherwise)
